MOD09A1_b1.tif: MODIS 500m red band
MOD09A1_b2.tif: MODIS 500m nir band
MOD09A1_b3.tif: MODIS 500m blue band
MOD09A1_b4.tif: MODIS 500m green band
MOD09A1_b5.tif: MODIS 500m SWIR band1
MOD09A1_b6.tif: MODIS 500m SWIR band2
MOD09A1_b7.tif: MODIS 500m SWIR band3
MOD09A1_qc.tif: MODIS 500m Quality Assessment flags
MOD09A1_sqa.tif: MODIS 500m State Quality Assessment flags

L71129046_04620080329_B10.TIF: Landsat ETM+ blue band
L71129046_04620080329_B20.TIF: Landsat ETM+ green band
L71129046_04620080329_B30.TIF: Landsat ETM+ red band
L71129046_04620080329_B40.TIF: Landsat ETM+ nir band
L71129046_04620080329_B50.TIF: Landsat ETM+ mid IR band 1
L71129046_04620080329_B61.TIF: Landsat ETM+ thermal band (low gain)
